subject: Hockey, Ice
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers agreed to terms with Dan Girardi, one of their best defensemen, but Ryan Callahan, the team’s captain and a pending free agent, is still the subject of trade rumors.
snippet: The Rangers agreed to terms with Dan Girardi, one of their best defensemen, but Ryan Callahan, the team’s captain and a pending free agent, is still the subject of trade rumors.
